Classes/BroadcastExtension.html#/c:@M@Ba.name: finish()
Classes/BroadcastExtension.html#/c:@M@Ba.abstract: Stops the Broadcast Extension and the broadcast session

Classes/BroadcastExtension.html.name: BroadcastExtension
